column3: Mass explosion hazard in which the entire body of explosives explodes as one.
Serious projectile hazard but does not have a mass explosion hazard.

Fire hazard and either a minor blast hazard or a minor projection hazard, or both, but does not have a mass explosion hazard. Explosives which give rise to considerable radiant heat or which burn to produce a minor blast or projection hazard.

Fire or slight explosion hazard, or both, with only local effect. Explosives which present only a low hazard in the event of ignition or initiation, where no significant blast or projection of fragments of appreciable size or range is expected.
